channel.title: Fantasy RPG w/out the "Leaving on an Adventure" part - What's it's name?
channel.description:
Hello, I was browsing drivethrurpg or was it kickstarter, and I remember seeing a fantasy role-playing game that you play townsfolk who defend a town, instead of leaving it for fame and fortune. I thought it sounded like a neat premise.
Does anyone know the name of this?

item.title: Fantasy RPG w/out the "Leaving on an Adventure" part - What's it's name?
item.dc:creator: @Deckard
item.description:
@Deckard wrote:

Also, the OSR game Beyond the Walls and Other Adventures…

Or The Watch - a PbtA game

Read full topic
item.source: Fantasy RPG w/out the "Leaving on an Adventure" part - What's it's name?
